name: Nail Woman
storyline: Keep your nails done! Go on, collect the nails, cut and slice the guys on the way and collect the money. Show your catwalk and legendary twerk dance.
summary: Can you pass the roof rails by your long nails and prove you are a baddie girl? It’s a combination of a racing game and fashion game with nail polish, acrylic nails and high heels. Cut and slice the guys on your podium to unlock new baddies and make long nails.
